column5: All I can think about is Musky now. It is that time of year again, where Bass and Salmon aren’t high on my list. Nothing hammers your lure like a big musky. To the point it startles you when they smash it. Or seeing the monster follow up and attack your lure. I have been using Handlebarz double 10’s %95 of my last two trips. They are amazing, they make their lures with care and quality parts. I haven’t fished a double 10 nearly as nice. They also have pulled in lots of big fish and always get action . I hit Lake St. Clair twice this week with my friend and it was a blast. We landed 5 musky in the two days and lost 6. Had more hits and follows then I can remember.  Both of us got a fish on figure 8’s and all we do are cast. We got 2, 40” musky and 3, 50’+. We also both got our PB. Enough reading here are some pictures.  40”       The 50” +
Was just thinking about you, I havn't heard from you in a while. Obviously you're doing well, nice to see! Congrat's on the fish dude, pretty incredible!
Easy buddy don't break your back with that musky. Lift with yourback straight and bend the legs lol. Those lsc musky are beautiful.  Is that strain specific to lsc?
Nice to see you last weekend Chris congrats on the pb's to you both. Great report
Hey, thanks guys. Mike was good seeing you as well, I am sure we will be seeing more of another over the next while.  Thanks Mike Borger I appreciate it. We will have to get out fishing soon.
Good stuff, Chris! Some great looking fish there!
Nice.   I throw the 10's probably 95% of the time and so far, they are producing.
nice outing Chris - gotta get me a couple of those soon.
